reviews.text: Well the station is located in a rather good location, obviously serving the university of Birmingham and the station has lifts to give step free access to the platforms. Also served by Cross country services here too however the installation of ticket barriers here can cause overcrowding to be even more of an issue. I'd dread to travel here during the rush hour.

Very busy even at what is considered to be off-peak times. Still needs more ticket machines and to be honest a redevelopment of the ticket barriers - trying to fit that volume of people through 4x barriers really wasn't thought through that well.
Simple basic station. Only a disabled toilet facility here, needing Radar key
Staff were very rude and wasted my time for no reason causing me to miss my train
very busy at this station but they do there best.
